title: New York New York Casino - Chin Chin
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Beer/Wine, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small restaurant chain in Los Angeles with a location at the New York New York Casino in Las Vegas. Any entree on the menu can use substitute tofu (soft or deep fried). In addition, some of the appetizers and noodles also have vegetable options as well as the lettuce cups. Upscale casual with a modern decor with lots of red and black accents.
